title: Pipedrive: Create or update organization
description: Update an organization in Pipedrive or create it if it does not exist yet. Custom organization fields may be included by using the long hash keys of the custom fields. These look like "33595c732cd7a027c458ea115a48a7f8a254fa86".

identifier.title: Organization ID
identifier.description: Identifier used to find existing organization in Pipedrive. Typically this is the name but it can also be a custom field value.

owner_id.title: Owner ID
owner_id.description: ID of the user who will be marked as the owner of this organization. Default is the user who ownes the API token.

add_time.title: Created at
add_time.description: If the organization is created, use this timestamp as the creation timestamp. Format: YYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
